dc_description_s: ITSA is the District’s method for the procurement of IT Staff Augmentation contractors. OST (Optimal Solutions and Technologies) facilitates the staff augmentation procurement process between District program managers and ITSA-registered vendors. OST has partnered with Peoplefluent to provide a fully-functional Vendor Management System that handles the workflow from beginning to end. The ITSA Project is ISO 9001:2008 compliant. More information at <a href=Nhttp://itsa.ostglobal.comN target=N_blankN>http://itsa.ostglobal.com.
dct_spatial_sm: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
dc_title_s: IT Staff Augmentation Current Open Requirements: Washington, D.C.
